full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTEN 'BREL SNYING PO'I BYABS KHRUS SDIG LTUNG MUN SEL SGRON ME BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES RTEN 'BREL PA'I BYABS KHRUS SDIG LTUNG MUN SEL SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA THO YON BKRA SHIS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DPAL SNAR THANG PA DANG, DGE BSHES 'CHANG KHA PA GNYIS KYI MDZAD PA'I RTEN 'BREL SNYING PO'I BYABS KHRUS LAS GZHI BYAS STE, LHA'I BTZUN PA SKU SKYE BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING BRGYAN DU 'BYON, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS RGYAL MTSAN,
